synopsis.text: It may seem like an ordinary day for the Nohara family and their beloved pet Shiro, but unbeknownst to them, Shiro leads a secret life as a superhero dog. His mission? To safeguard the legendary bone known as 'Bobobobobone' from falling into the wrong paws. The bone is rumored to possess the power to rule the world, making it a highly sought-after prize for the evil inventor dog Dekapoo, who harbors ambitions of global domination. As Super Shiro, our hero must navigate a world of comedy and adventure to ensure the bone's safety and protect the Earth from Dekapoo's nefarious plans. Will Super Shiro be able to save the day and keep the world spinning in peace? Join the Nohara family dog on his thrilling journey and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
